title: The Story of The Unique Sheep
description: Elizabeth the Shetland sheep lives on a farm filled with color. She wishes her wool was something more interesting than white-so one day she makes her dream come true.... In this charming children's tale, Dianne and Laura Lough tell the story of how the spunky sheep Elizabeth inspired Laura's wool dyeing business, The Unique Sheep. At the end of the book are three simple knitting projects perfect for the whole family.
author: Dianne Lough
